org.dapper.server

Class ClientState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dapper.server.ClientState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Locatable, org.shared.event.EnumStatus<ClientStatus>, org.shared.event.Handler<ControlEvent>, org.shared.parallel.Handle<Object>

    public class ClientState
extends Object
implements org.shared.event.Handler<ControlEvent>, Locatable, Cloneable, org.shared.event.EnumStatus<ClientStatus>, org.shared.parallel.Handle<Object>
    The Dapper server-side client state that stores information on a per-client basis, but forwards all events on to a ServerProcessor instance.
